item.description:
Come and Join us for Great fun! It will be nice to see everyone It's been a long time!

Run for Cover is a Great Band, I have heard them play a few times. They are also Friends of mine from work. They play for good causes. Benefits, Charities ect. They play all Music and take Requests. This is a five piece Band!

Lets all get together to support this Great Band and DANCE!! Bring your FUN self to the Haluwa to meetup for ole times! I'm Looking forward to seeing all my dancing peeps!  <3 :D

I will be there for 7:30 to get tables together for plenty of seating. We can eat Chineese food and hang out until the band starts. The Haluwa has a great menu.

 

 

Band plays from 9-1am

No Cover Charge

Not far from many Towns

Bring your great attitude and show it on the Dance floor!

Of course I will have my camera! "/

>You can message me or call if needed. 603.670.5025

 

See y'all There! =")
item.how_to_find_us: I will have tables by the dance floor just ask the waitress she will know! :-)

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: "Run For Cover" Great Entertainment Free Admission!
